text: The 2015 Ukrainian Super Cup became the twelfth edition of Ukrainian Super Cup, an annual football match contested by the winners of the previous season's Ukrainian Top League and Ukrainian Cup competitions. The match was played at the Chornomorets Stadium, Odesa, on 14 July 2015, and contested by league winner Dynamo Kyiv and runner-up Shakhtar Donetsk. Shakhtar won it 2–0. After ejection of Oleksandr Shovkovskiy on 90th minute, his post took over by defender Aleksandar Dragović. ==Match== ===Details=== {| width=92% | |- | | |} {|width="100%" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="background:transparent;font-size:90%;line-height:1.4" |-valign="top" |width="50%"| {|align="center" border="0" cellspacing="2" cellpadding="0" style="background:transparent" |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| !!
